pullRequest.title: Issue 16939 & 17981 related content dialog checkbox issues

commit.message: dotCMS/core#16936 Clickable Link Anywhere on Related Content Needs to Select Relate Content Checkbox
dotCMS/core#17981 When searching for related content, click to relate is disabled

nodes.bodyText: it is hard to see that we have multi inputs hidden tag here, maybe you should split them into several lines
